titleStmt.title: The amorous bigotte with the second part of Tegue O Divelly : a comedy ... / written by Tho. Shadwell ...
Amorous bigotte
titleStmt.author: Shadwell, Thomas, 1642?-1692.

notesStmt.note: Another issue of the same year has "biggottee" instead of "bigotte" in title.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
